name: System Flaw Recruit
description:
This innovative, action shooter uses the Nintendo DSi Camera application to turn your surroundings into the playing environment! Truly unique and totally physical with 360 degrees of intensity, System Flaw Recruit is the future of handheld gaming excitement. You have been chosen to take part in the most arduous training program to combat the threat we call the Flaw. The invasion could take place at any time, so we need the best there is!

Innovative, action shooter uses the camera to turn your surroundings into the playing environment!
